Main.title: Easy for Exchange, Coin Swap
Main.paragraph1: Try to use difficult and complex cryptocurrency exchange easily and conveniently with coin swap!
Main.paragraph2: Convenient coin swap method without commission!

Project.paragraph: Connect the decentralized Crypto wallet and swap it with the other coins.
features: Secure OTC transaction based on smart contract

Trustless.title: Any coin or quantity trustless escrow
Trustless.paragraph1: OTC transactions that can be shared without third-party escrow risk,
Trustless.paragraph2: Coinswap guarantee P2P transactions through smart contracts.

Monitoring.title: Real-time network activity monitoring
Monitoring.paragraph1: You can trade coins under optimized conditions by monitoring the current trading volume,
Monitoring.paragraph2: trading top traders, and recently swapped volumes in real time.

Allocation.title: Token Allocation
Allocation.paragraph: We transparently share the purpose of using funds.

Feature.title: Still hesitating to use Coinswap?
Feature.paragraph1: Different exchanges have different fees and burdensome deposits removed from coin swaps.
Feature.paragraph2: Use it right away without signing up.

Roadmap.title: CoinSwap Roadmap
Roadmap.paragraph: Coinswap is advancing day by day.

Footer.paragraph: Cryptocurrency is not legalized as in reality currency. Cryptocurrency is also available 24 hours a day, 365 days a year, and there are no limits to the price, which can change diversely and dramatically due to changes in markets, economy and regulations around the world. Cryptocurrency Investment does not guarantee gains and losses that are attributed to you, so please refrain from unreasonable investments and make a careful decisions.
